notesStmt.note: An expanded reissue of STC 22105, with quire I reset and K1 added. I4r catchword: iudgement,.
Signatures: [3 stars], A-I4 K2 (last leaf blank).
Reproduction of the originals in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library (reel 1584:19) and University of Illinois Library (reel 2141:2).
Imperfect: parts of copies at both locations lacking; at 2141:2, preliminaries, preface p.3, sign. K lacking and added in ms.
